alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Knott; Letcher; Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Letcher, eastern Knott, southern Floyd and southwestern Pike Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Rockhouse to Larkslane. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rockhouse, Lookout, Marrowbone, Garden Village and Virgie around 325 PM EDT. Ashcamp and Belcher around 330 PM EDT. Elkhorn City and Cedarville around 335 PM EDT. Orkney around 340 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Wheelwright, Hall, Greenleaf, Halo, Buckingham, Burton, Melvin, Hi Hat, Deane and Price. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
